name: Offering for FSM
description:
Offering for FSM is my entry for Ludum Dare 44  with a theme of "Your life is currency"

CONTROLS
WASD or ARROW Keys to movement
Space or Escape to pause

HOW TO PLAY
Navigate through the procedurally generated maze, and collect items to increase your worth before you offer yourself to the FSM. Make sure you offer equal or above the value that the FSM demand.

TOOLS
Audacity
Gimp
Inkscape Studio
Kdenlive
OBS
Unity3D Visual Studio Community
VLC
